I practiced Chinese Medicine for over 20 years, and taught for over half that time. My specialty at the college was herbal medicine and diagnosis, and in proactice I mixed acupuncture, herbal medicine, and food therapy. This is an occasional series on food, herbs, and Chinese medicine.
